attributes.action: Bring down insurance prices for young drivers (17-21)
attributes.additional_details: It is about time we make our selves noticed we are getting ripped off for the prices of first year insurance quotes for example they are narrowing the gap between male and female premiums well what a farce a friends of mine she is the same age as me and we both got a quote for the same car (1.2 corsa 2003) her quote £1800 comprehensive my quote £5578 third party fire and theft! And we live close so it's not postcodes that have an increase in cost also I have a job and that is nearly my annual wage it is a joke day light robbery they can't get away with it.
